movies.title: Vålnaden
movies.plot: An adulterous couple, Nina Adler and Martin Rittner,are blown up in a beach-house explosion and foul play is suspected. Peter,Nina's husband and Martin's business partner, is a thuggish,dodgy sort but Rittner's wife gives him an alibi. A tramp,subject to memory losses,known to be in the area at the time of the murders,who participated in scams for Adler and Rittner, is also killed but again Adler has an alibi. Wallander learns that the key to the murders lies in a particularly despicable business fraud and a man out for terrible revenge for deeply personal reasons.
movies.simplePlot: An adulterous couple, Nina Adler and Martin Rittner,are blown up in a beach-house explosion and foul play is suspected. Peter,Nina's husband and Martin's business partner, is a thuggish,...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Lena Endre was born on July 8, 1955 in Härnösand, Västernorrlands län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (2009). She was previously married to Richard Hobert, Thomas Hanzon, Vjeko Benzon and Malte Ekblom.
biography.name: Lena Endre

biography.bio: Sverrir Gudnason was born on September 12, 1978. He is an actor, known for Valse pour Monica (2013), Gentlemen (2014) and Blowfly Park (2014).
biography.name: Sverrir Gudnason

biography.bio: Nina Zanjani was born on September 1, 1981 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress, known for Mind the Gap (2007), Balls (2010) and Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Nina Zanjani

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Douglas Johansson was born on January 31, 1960. He is an actor, known for The Impossible (2012), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arn: The Knight Templar (2007).
biography.name: Douglas Johansson

biography.bio: Stina Ekblad was born on February 26, 1954 in Solf, Finland. She is an actress, known for Love Is All You Need (2012), Hjälp! (2007) and Une solution rationnelle (2009).
biography.name: Stina Ekblad

biography.bio: Henny Åman is an actress, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005).
biography.name: Henny Åman

biography.bio: Dejan Cukic was born on November 25, 1966 in Berane, Montenegro, Yugoslavia. He is an actor and director, known for In China They Eat Dogs (1999), Le piège (2007) and Just Another Love Story (2007).
biography.name: Dejan Cukic

biography.bio: Iben Hjejle was born on March 22, 1971 in Copenhagen, Denmark. She is an actress, known for High Fidelity (2000), Mifune (1999) and Defiance (2008). She was previously married to Emil de Waal.
biography.name: Iben Hjejle

biography.bio: Per Morberg was born on June 23, 1960 in Stockholm, Sweden. He is an actor, known for As It Is in Heaven (2004), Zingo (1998) and Bip Bop Bip Bop Bap (2006).
biography.name: Per Morberg

biography.bio: Felix Engström was born on September 3, 1968 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Svensson Svensson (1994), Nobel's Last Will (2012) and Brott§våg (2000). He has been married to Lydia since 2013.
biography.name: Felix Engström

biography.bio: Anna Bjelkerud was born on July 18, 1959 in Malmö, Skåne län, Sweden as Anna Carina Lovisa Bjelkerud. She is an actress, known for Hotel (2013), The Giant (2016) and Call Girl (2012).
biography.name: Anna Bjelkerud

biography.bio: Cecilia Runesson is an actress, known for Libertas (2016), Johan Falk: National Target (2009) and How Soon Is Now? (2007).
biography.name: Cecilia Runesson
